title: Scheduling an Appointment with a doctor
content: To schedule an appointment with a doctor, visit the hospital website channel doctor section or call the reception at 011 1234567. Available slots are listed in the channel doctor section.

title: Guidace for booking an appointment from web
content: To schedule your appointment with a doctor using the form, start by entering your full name in the Full Name field. This should be your complete name, as it appears on your ID or health records, to ensure proper identification. Next, input your email address in the Email field. This is important because you’ll receive a confirmation and any additional information about your appointment through this email. Then, provide a valid phone number in the Phone Number field. This allows us to contact you if we need to update you about your appointment or send reminders.  After that, select the department you'd like to visit from the dropdown menu. For example, you can choose General Medicine, Pediatrics, Dermatology, and so on. Once you’ve selected the department, the next dropdown will let you choose a doctor from that department. Choose the doctor you wish to schedule an appointment with.  In the Preferred Date field, pick a convenient date for your appointment by clicking the calendar icon. Make sure to select a date when the doctor is available; if not, we’ll suggest alternate dates. Then, in the Preferred Time field, select a time slot that fits your schedule from the available options.  You’ll also find a field asking for the Reason for Visit. Here, briefly describe why you’re scheduling the appointment. For example, it could be a routine check-up, a headache, or any other specific reason. This helps the doctor prepare for your visit.  Finally, after ensuring all the fields are filled correctly, click the Submit button at the bottom of the form. Your appointment request will be sent to the hospital, and you’ll receive a confirmation email with the details of your appointment. If you need to make any changes, you can contact the hospital using the information provided in the confirmation.

title: How to calcel or reschedule an appointment
content: To reschedule or calcel an appointment, you can follow the link in the confirmation email or call the reception at 011 1234567.You need your appointment number to reschedule or cancel it.

title: guidance to calcel or reschedule an appointment
content: If you need to cancel or reschedule your appointment, the process is simple. To cancel, locate the confirmation email you received when you scheduled the appointment. Inside, you'll find a link or button labeled 'Cancel Appointment.' Click this, and you’ll be taken to a page where you can confirm the cancellation. Once confirmed, your appointment will be canceled, and you'll receive an email confirming the cancellation.  To reschedule, follow a similar process. In the confirmation email, click the 'Reschedule Appointment' link. This will take you to a form where you can choose a new date and time for your appointment. Simply select a new date from the calendar and choose a time slot that works best for you. Once you've selected the new time, submit the form, and your appointment will be updated. You’ll receive an updated confirmation email with the new appointment details. If you have any issues or need assistance, feel free to contact the hospital directly using the contact information provided in the email.

title: About and history of hospital
content: Horizon Health Corporation PLC commenced operations in Sri Lanka on 12th August 2005, under the brand name of Horizon Hospitals, a part of the chain of Horizon Hospitals founded by the renowned Dr. Nimal J. Perera in Sri Lanka. As the only purpose-built private hospital of its kind in Sri Lanka, Horizon Colombo revolutionized Sri Lanka’s healthcare service, and today under the brand Horizon Health, we continue to dominate and lead the healthcare sector. Ours is still considered to be the best healthcare facility in the country.  In 2015, we celebrated a decade of excellence in healthcare. Over the past decade, Horizon Health has revolutionized the healthcare industry in Sri Lanka through infrastructure development and advancement of its products and services, through sizeable investments, with a view to deliver healthcare that is on par with global developments in medical technology. We also play a critical role in the nation’s strategy to provide world-class medical care whilst balancing the equation of affordability and accessibility for all Sri Lankans.

In this dynamic environment, our medical and support teams are focused on five key areas: enhancing safety and quality, driving innovation and technological advancement, empowering our people, ensuring sustainability, and achieving financial stability. By investing time and resources into these strategic areas, we continue to elevate the standards of healthcare.Horizon Hospitals is committed to total customer satisfaction by providing affordable services while upholding the highest standards of professionalism, quality, safety, accuracy, integrity, and courtesy. We aim to meet all statutory, regulatory, and ethical requirements through the utilization of effective management practices, cutting-edge healthcare technologies, our strengths and affiliations, and a quality management system compliant with ISO 9001. We also focus on continuous improvement by valuing service feedback and fostering staff dedication, commitment, and teamwork to bring satisfaction to every patient.

title: hospital facilities information

The hospital rooms at Horizon are thoughtfully designed to provide patients with maximum comfort and care throughout their stay. Each room is equipped with modern amenities, ensuring an environment that promotes healing and recovery. Horizon Hospital offers a variety of room options to meet diverse patient needs. Private rooms provide a tranquil and personalized space, featuring en-suite bathrooms, comfortable furnishings, and entertainment facilities, making them ideal for those seeking privacy and a peaceful healing atmosphere.  In addition to private rooms, Horizon Hospital also offers semi-private rooms for patients who prefer a shared space with a fellow patient. These rooms are carefully arranged to maintain patient privacy while encouraging a sense of companionship. No matter the room type, Horizon Hospital places the highest priority on hygiene, safety, and patient well-being. Our dedicated staff is committed to delivering compassionate care, ensuring that every patient experiences a comfortable and reassuring stay as they progress toward recovery. To learn more about our facilities, please visit the facilities section of our website.
